<!-- ### Learning and Memory  -->

Mr. Lopez has High Average abilities in learning and recognizing abstract visual materials and distinguishing correct from incorrect responses. He demonstrates an Average ability to recognize relevant information among distractions after a delay, recall lists over short and long periods, and remember verbal information. He retains an Average amount of story and visual details over time. However, he strugged with remembering detailed narratives over time and learning complex verbal information in a single attempt, both of which were slightly Below Average.
